title: Statify
description: An application to expand and view your listening habits. Made using Next.js and Spotifyâ€™s API.
longDescription: Statify was created to easily expand your own music taste based on similar artists and songs you like. If you want to, explore entirely new genres & artists.

title: Medito
description: A fundraiser website created for a well-established meditation organization.
longDescription: Medito was a fundraising project I was assigned by a well-established meditation organization. The deadline for this project was a little under a week, but I finished within the timeframe and this solution was accepted.

title: Portfolio
description: My website displaying my knowledge, experiences, tech-stack and a little about me.
longDescription: This website was created to display my knowledge, experiences, tech-stack and a little about me. Far from the first one, but the best one yet.
